steps.name: user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage
clicks on loginIcon
enters "uranuskohi" in the userName input field
enters "Helloworld0" in the password input field
clicks on Login button

elements.name: TC_01 Being able to see the lesson details as a Vice Dean and update the information

steps.name: click on Lessons
scroll down to Lesson List
vice dean can see the Lesson Name
vice dean can see the Compulsory field
vice dean can see the Credit
click on the last page
go to the last page
go up
vice dean is able to see and delete the created lesson

verify the lesson is deleted

steps.name: clicks on loginIcon
enters "uranus" in the userName input field
enters "Madrid01" in the password input field
clicks on Login button

elements.name: TC_01 Student goes and see her/his exam grade and meeting announcement

steps.name: student goes to Choose Lesson Management
student should be able to see the Teacher on the Choose Lesson List
student can see the day on the Choose Lesson List
student should be able to see the StartTime on the Choose Lesson List
student should see the StopTime on the Choose Lesson List
select the wanted Lessons
click on Submit button for add lesson
student is able to see the chosen Lessons on the Lesson Program List
student should be able to delete the chosen lesson from the list
student is not able to delete the chosen lesson from the list
student should click on the menu and should be able to see the Main Menu List
student should click on Grades and Announcements
student should be able to see his exam grades if it is added by their teacher in the Student Info List
student should be able to see the meeting created by his advisor on the Meet List
close the application

name: Students, choose lesson, grades and announcement
